name: 11 minute incursion
description:
Background

We have received a distress call from a terraforming colony under attack by aliens. The nuclear reactor has been damaged in the fighting and will go into meltdown soon. You must rescue the eleven colonists before the reactor explodes in eleven minutes. Be careful not to get eaten by the aliens.

Instructions

Find the colonists and escort them to the exit area and get all your soldiers back there as well before time runs out. Deploy your soldiers carefully so there is always someone looking in each direction or the aliens might sneak up behind you. Use the motion scanners and automated gun turret to increase your chances.

Controls

Left click: select a soldier, move selected soldier.
Right click: selected soldier will turn to face that direction.
Left press and drag: set destination and heading for selected soldier at the same time.

F1, F2, F3: select soldier hotkeys.
F5, F6: zoom in and out.

F3: press while soldier 3 is already selected to deploy or retrieve the automated gun turret.
Escape: exit game.
